response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs, holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,000,000. Considering its unparalleled quality and potential impact on your endeavors, I am extending to you the chance to secure this asset at an exclusive price of $900,000. This offer reflects my commitment to finding the right buyer who can truly appreciate and utilize the product's full potential. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 900000}
